summary.para: The AppPolicyCreateFileAccess enumeration indicates whether a process has full or restricted access to the IO devices (file, file stream, directory, physical disk, volume, console buffer, tape drive, communications resource, mailslot, and pipe).
Indicates that the process has full access to the IO devices. This value is expected for a desktop application, or for a Desktop Bridge application.
Indicates that the process has limited access to the IO devices. This value is expected for a UWP app.
